CustomField.description: The two-letter country/region code, defined by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) ISO 3166-1 scheme, identifying the country/region which the business uses for mailing purposes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The two-letter country/region code, defined by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) ISO 3166-1 scheme, identifying the country/region which the business uses for mailing purposes.
CustomField.label: Mailing Address Country/Region Code
